name: Multiplayer Cyberpunk Shootout Beta
description:
Cyberpunk Shootout is a team based multiplayer FPS game. It was developed as a response to “rival” Year 10 students wanting to battle for glory during a lunchtime games club. This game has undergone rigorous testing both during class time “training sessions” and most recently in our first weekly lunchtime activity.

 

The initial inspiration for the games theme was to be purely a Team Based experience set in a cyberpunk environment. This has somewhat changed over the course of development with the addition of a military style arena, along with the addition of extra game modes. Game modes included are:

  • Team Death Match
  • Free-For-All
  • Capture the Flag

 

This is by no means a fully polished experience,  and is currently only setup to play via local network (I have not tested any other setup) however the game runs extremely well. Cyberpunk Shootout was developed using Unreal Engine 5.  Any feedback or suggestions are most welcome!
